parsed.internal_thinking: The board has several high-probability clusters. Node 20 is particularly strong with 12 total pips (Wood 11, Brick 6, Sheep 8), providing a balanced mix of resources essential for early road building and settlement expansion. Node 43 has the highest pip count (13), but it's entirely Wheat (Wh9, Wh6, Wh9), which lacks versatility. Node 42 is another strong 12-pip contender (Wh9, O5, Wh9), offering a heavy Ore/Wheat focus. As the first player, I'll secure Node 20 to ensure steady production of Brick and Sheep (both on high-probability 6 and 8 tokens). This sets a solid foundation for expansion. I'll aim to pick up a strong Wheat and Ore source with my second settlement on the return turn, likely looking towards the southern cluster if Node 41 or 42 remains available. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Alice: Secured Node 20 (W11, B6, S8). Need Wheat and Ore for the second settlement. Target Nodes: 41, 42, or 25.
parsed.say_outloud: Hi everyone! Good luck to us all. I'll start things off by taking this nice spot in the middle-north. Those 6s and 8s look too good to pass up!
